name: GAS (Crazy Homeboys)
description:
Hey fellas! We are back with a rts game :v *WIP*

Surrounded by mustard gas, you must keep the nexus dissipating with the only fuel in the world, civilians. You will have to expand your area of influence generating clean air networks to explore, capture and collect materials.

Remember, civilians are not your friends but your source of energy

"And the General who was Beast, saw the fruit of the labour of his dogs, and with the Wrath that was His, admonished them for their laziness, as the thirst of progress that carries man to Domination never had a conclusion into time... "

Controls:
- Left click to build & Right Click to cancel construction

- Right click on buildings to display context-menu

- R and T to rotate buildings

- WASD / ARROW KEYS for camera movement

Credits:

- Fernando Labarta Martín  [Rafer]
- Patricio Hidalgo Sánchez  [Trisio]
- Sergio Hernández-Alcelay  [Bini]

Updates:
